p: Results of growth inhibition percentage (GI %) in MTZ and P. roseum-treated groups at 24-hr intervals are shown in Figure. 1. It was shown that there was significant difference in GI% between MTZ and P. roseum EO-treated groups and the control group. Based on dose- GI% graphs, 2.5, 5, and 10 Âµg/mL of MTZ and P. roseum EO resulted in different responses of GI% ( Figure. 1).
